description.point: This is social media website like Facebook.
In this website I have implemented post system, so that any user can post easily
A user can also delete or delete his post
A user can give a reaction to any post, there are 6 reactions here, a user can give a reaction to any post like Facebook.
And a user can also comment on any user's post.
I have implemented a friend request system on this website, any user can send a friend request, cancel the sent request, just like Facebook.
Apart from this, I have provided options like updating my profile on this website, a user can add his profile photo, cover photo, name, bio, location etc.
I faced many problems while creating this website and I learned a lot while creating this website.
